About The Author

Jordan began his career as a public relations intern at CNN Center in Atlanta. He also worked at a talent agency in Miami Beach, a film production company in Hollywood, and at a top-tier talent agency in Beverly Hills. He is the author of ‚ÄúCelebrity Leverage: Insider Secrets to Getting Celebrity Endorsements, Instant Credibility & Star-Powered Publicity,‚Äù ‚ÄúSecrets to Contacting Celebrities: 101 Ways to Reach the Rich & Famous,‚Äù & ‚ÄúThe Celebrity Black Book: Over 56,000+ Verified Celebrity Addresses.‚Äù

Jordan and Contact Any Celebrity have been featured by ABC News, AMEX, BBC, CNN, E! News, Entrepreneur, Fast Company, Forbes, Fox News, The Guardian, The Mirror (UK), New York Daily News, New York Post, Newsweek, Tim Ferriss‚Äô ‚ÄúThe 4-Hour Workweek,‚Äù USA Today, The Wrap, and more.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Contact Barbra Streisand plus 59,000+ celebrities, influencers, and public figures using our online database.

How is Barbra Streisand connected to Donald Trump?

Barbra Streisand and Donald Trump have had a contentious relationship, primarily marked by Streisand‚Äôs public criticisms of Trump during his presidency. A vocal critic, Streisand expressed her disapproval of Trump‚Äôs policies and actions on multiple occasions.

How is Barbra Streisand connected to Joe Biden?

Barbra Streisand has been a vocal supporter of Joe Biden. She endorsed him during his presidential campaign and has continued to back him throughout his presidency. Streisand has publicly expressed her support for Biden‚Äôs policies and leadership, contrasting them with her criticisms of former President Donald Trump.

How is Barbra Streisand conntected to Kamala Harris?

Barbra Streisand is connected to Kamala Harris through her political support. Streisand has publicly endorsed and supported Harris, particularly during the 2020 presidential campaign. She has praised Harris for her qualifications and historic role as the first female, first Black, and first South Asian Vice President of the United States.

How is Barbra Streisand connected to Oprah Winfrey?

Barbra Streisand and Oprah Winfrey are connected through their influence and interactions in the entertainment industry. Streisand appeared on Oprah‚Äôs talk show, where they discussed Streisand‚Äôs career and personal life.

How is Barbra Streisand conected to Taylor Swift?

Barbra Streisand and Taylor Swift are connected through their remarkable achievements in the music industry. Both artists have tied for the record of the most Album of the Year Grammy nominations among women, each having six nominations. Swift also recently broke Streisand‚Äôs record for the most No. 1 albums by a female artist.

Who is Barbra Streisand?

Barbra Streisand is an American singer, actress, director, and producer renowned for her versatile talent and significant impact on the entertainment industry. Born on April 24, 1942, in Brooklyn, New York, she has won numerous awards, including multiple Grammys, Oscars, Emmys, and a Tony Award. Streisand is known for her powerful voice and has sold over 145 million records worldwide. She is also a dedicated philanthropist, founding the Barbra Streisand Women‚Äôs Heart Center and co-founding the Women‚Äôs Heart Alliance to promote heart health awareness.
